scripts.start: npm install && cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- dev
scripts.dev: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- dev
scripts.dist: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- dist
scripts.icons:admin: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- icons:admin
scripts.icons:theme: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- icons:theme
scripts.validate: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- lint
scripts.watch: cd node_modules/@gravityforms/gulp-tasks && npm run gulp -- watch
